snippet: Columbus will make its second appearance in the playoffs, opening with a series against Pittsburgh.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Columbus Blue Jackets beat Florida Panthers for the eighth straight time, 3-2, clinching the first wild-card spot in the Eastern Conference; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Columbus will make its second appearance in the playoffs, opening with a series against Pittsburgh.

headline.main: Blue Jackets Secure No. 1 Wild Card
headline.print_headline: Blue Jackets Secure No. 1 Wild Card
